snippet: Eric Ryan, a founder of the cleaning products maker Method, says that finding a suitor with similar values — in this case, the Belgian company Ecover — was important to the company.
abstract: Eric Ryan, co-founder of cleaning products maker Method, says finding a suitor with similar values--in this case, Belgian company Ecover--was important to the company.
lead_paragraph: Eric Ryan, a founder of the cleaning products maker Method, says that finding a suitor with similar values — in this case, the Belgian company Ecover — was important to the company.

headline.seo: A Founder of the Soap Maker Method Discusses Its Sale
headline.main: A Soap Maker Sought Compatibility in a Merger Partner
headline.print_headline: A Soap Maker Sought Compatibility In a Merger Partner
